Column.Name: Fundable Forms
Funding Dropdown Values
Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $set := DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "RecordID", "Description" ), [Funding Target EFormType], "[Status] <> 'Setup' AND [Description] IS NOT EMPTY AND [LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & IF( [Funding Target EFormType] = [Funding Source EFormType], " AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Funding Source RecordID]) ) );
RETURN $set

Label.Text: Select the type of entity funded by the <Funding Source Type>

Binding.Expression: "Select the type of entity funded by the " & LOWER([Funding Source Type])

Label.Text: Select the <Funding Source Type> record being funded

Binding.Expression: "Select the " & LOWER([Funding Source Type]) & " record being funded"

Label.Text: Enter the amount of funding given to the target record
Specify the effective date of this funding agreement

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"
"

Label.Text: The amount of funding sent from the funding source to the target record
The effective date of this funding agreement

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is given access via source contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Funding Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the source contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the source contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is given access via target contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Funding Target RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the target contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the target contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is given access via source contract WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Funding Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO [Contract] ON ([Funding Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] OR [Funding Target RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID]) AND (CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role])
GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] GET COUNT(1) > 0
